title: AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Rishikesh (AIIMS Rishikesh) has released the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientists and Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MVSc, BDS, BAMS, Post Graduation, Diplome, Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AIIMS Ri...
